cn.words: 你_好！_怎么样？

contents.en: hello! How are you.

cn.words: 我_不_舒服！_我_刚_去_看医生_了。_这_几_天_一直_不_舒服。
cn.pinyins: wǒ_bú_shū fú_wǒ_gāng_qù_kàn yī shēng_le_zhè_jǐ_tiān_yì zhí_bú_shū fú

contents.en: not too well! I’m just to the doctor. I haven’t been feeling too well.. over the last few days.

cn.words: 你_怎么_了？_头痛？_感冒_了？

contents.en: what have you got? A headache? A cold?

cn.words: 我_不_知道_怎么_了。_我_只是_觉得_很_疲惫。
cn.pinyins: wǒ_bù_zhī dào_zěn me_le_wǒ_zhǐ shì_jué de_hěn_pí bèi

contents.en: I don’t what’s wrong with me. I just feel exhausted.

cn.words: 或许_是_因为_你_工作_太_用功_了。_你_的_工作_压力_确实_很_大。
cn.pinyins: huò xǔ_shì_yīn wéi_nǐ_gōng zuò_tài_yòng gōng_le_nǐ_de_gōng zuò_yā lì_què shí_hěn_dà

contents.en: perhaps you’ve been working too hard. You do have a high-pressure job.

cn.words: 或许_吧。_我_也_没_心情_吃饭。_这_不_正常。

contents.en: maybe. I haven’t been able to keep my food down either. That’s unusual.

cn.words: 嗯。_我_相信_吃_了_医生_开_的_药_你_就_会_好_的。

contents.en: well. I’m sure the doctor will be able to prescribe something to make you well again. Dr. Jameson is very good.

cn.words: 对_啊。_我_约_了_十_点_钟，_我_要_走_了。

contents.en: yes, he is. I’ve make an appointment for 10 o’clock, so I’d better move along.

cn.words: 好。_祝_你_早日_康复。_放松_点。_我_相信_医生_会_治好_的。
cn.pinyins: hǎo_zhù_nǐ_zǎo rì_kāng fù_fàng sōng_diǎn_wǒ_xiāng xìn_yī shēng_huì_zhì hǎo_de

contents.en: OK. Hope you feel better soon. You should take it easy. I’m sure the doctor will prescribe rest, you know.

cn.words: 早上_好，_哪儿_不_舒服？

contents.en: Good morning. What's the matter?

cn.words: 早上_好，_医生。_我_感到_头晕，_而且_发烧。
cn.pinyins: zǎo shàng_hǎo_yī shēng_wǒ_gǎn dào_tóu yūn_ér qiě_fā shāo

contents.en: Good morning ,doctor, I feel dizzy and weak and I'm running a temperature.

cn.words: 还_有些_别的_症状_吗？

contents.en: Do you have any other symptoms?

cn.words: 是的。_咳_得_很_厉害，_并且_胸部_也_疼。

contents.en: Yes, I have a bad cough and my chest also aches.

cn.words: 我_知道_了。_让_我_量_量_你_的_体温，_请_把_温度计_放_在_胳膊_下。
cn.pinyins: wǒ_zhī dao_le_ràng_wǒ_liáng_liáng_nǐ_de_tǐ wēn_qǐng_bǎ_wēn dù jì_fàng_zài_gē bó_xià

contents.en: I see, Now let me take your temperature, Put this thermometer in under your arm please.

cn.words: 医生，_我_现在_的_体温_是_多少？

contents.en: Doctor, how about my temperature now?

cn.words: 三十九度五。
医生，_我_严重_吗？

contents.en: Doctor,am I serious?

cn.words: 一点_也_不_重。

contents.en: it's nothing serious.

cn.words: 你_的_话_使_我_松_了_一口气。

contents.en: I'm relieved to hear that.

cn.words: 你_需要_打_一_针_来_降_体温，_你_对_一些_药物_过敏_吗？
cn.pinyins: nǐ_xū yào_dǎ_yì_zhēn_lái_jiàng_tǐ wēn_nǐ_duì_yī xiē_yào wù_guò mǐn_ma

contents.en: You need a shot to lower body temperature, some drugs you are allergic to it?

cn.words: 我_不能_肯定。

contents.en: I'm not sure.

cn.words: 那么_我们_来_给_你_查_一_查。

contents.en: Well, We'll check on that.

cn.words: 把_这_张_纸条_拿_去_注射_室_交_给_护士。

contents.en: Take this slip to the injection room and give it to the nurse.

cn.words: 她_会_给_你_做_皮_试_的。

contents.en: She will give you a test.

cn.words: 如果_你_做_皮试_没_问题_的话，_她_会_给_你_打针_的。
cn.pinyins: rú guǒ_nǐ_zuò_pí shì_méi_wèn tí_de huà_tā_huì_gěi_nǐ_dǎ zhēn_de

contents.en: If you test is all right, she will give you an injection.

cn.words: 我_要_吃_点_什么_药_吗？

contents.en: Do I need any medicine?

cn.words: 是的。_我_要_给_你_开_一些_治_头痛_的_药_以及_一些_抗生素_药丸。
cn.pinyins: shì de_wǒ_yào_gěi_nǐ_kāi_yī xiē_zhì_tóu tòng_de_yào_yǐ jí_yī xiē_kàng shēng sù_yào wán

contents.en: Yes, I'll prescribe some headache medicine and some antibiotic.

cn.words: 你_觉得_我_还_应该_注意_些_什么_吗？

contents.en: What else do you advise me to do?

cn.words: 在_家_待_上_一_两_天，_注意_保暖，_多_喝_点水，_并_要_好好_休息。
cn.pinyins: zài_jiā_dāi_shàng_yī_liǎng_tiān_zhù yì_bǎo nuǎn_duō_hē_diǎn shuǐ_bìng_yào_hǎo hǎo_xiū xī

contents.en: Stay at home for a day or two, keep warm, drink plenty of water, and have a good rest.

cn.words: 这是_你_的_处方。_把_它_拿到_药房_去_交给_药剂师，_他_会_告诉_你_该_怎么_服药_的。
cn.pinyins: zhè shì_nǐ_de_chǔ fāng_bǎ_tā_ná dào_yào fáng_qù_jiāo gěi_yào jì shī_tā_huì_gào sù_nǐ_gāi_zěn me_fú yào_de

contents.en: Here is your prescription .Take it to the chemist at the dispensary and he will tell you the dosage.

cn.words: 非常_谢谢_你，_医生。

contents.en: Thank you very much ,doctor.

cn.words: 早上_好，_我_想_让_你_按照_处方_配药。

contents.en: Good morning, I'd like to have these prescriptions filled, please.

cn.words: 好的，_大概_需要_五分钟。_请_在_外面_等候，_我_去_给_你_配药。
cn.pinyins: hǎo de_dà gài_xū yào_wǔ fèn zhōng_qǐng_zài_wài miàn_děng hòu_wǒ_qù_gěi_nǐ_pèi yào

contents.en: Yes, It will about 5 minutes, Please wait outside and I'll have them for you.

cn.words: 谢谢。

contents.en: Well, We'll check on that.

cn.words: 刘易斯_先生？

contents.en: Mr.Lewis?

cn.words: 在_这儿。

contents.en: Yes. Here.

cn.words: 这是_你_的_药。

contents.en: Here is your medicine.

cn.words: 这些_胶囊_怎么_吃？

contents.en: How about the capsules?

cn.words: 瓶子_上_有_药_的_服法，_饭后_每次_两_片，_每日_三_次。
cn.pinyins: píng zi_shàng_yǒu_yào_de_fú fǎ_fàn hòu_měi cì_liǎng_piàn_měi rì_sān_cì

contents.en: The dosage is written on the bottle.Take two tablets each time ,three times a day after meal.

cn.words: 还有_别_的_药_吗？

contents.en: Anything else?

cn.words: 没有_了。_总共_十五_元_五角。

contents.en: No, That comes to 15.5 yuan.

cn.words: 给你_二十_元。

contents.en: Here is 20 yuan.

cn.words: 这是_你_的_零钱。_祝_你_早日_康复。

contents.en: And here is your change.I wish you a quick recovery.
